title: Minister Gamini Lokuge appointed as the Minister of Energy
content: Minister Gamini Lokuge states that he has been sworn in as the new Minister of Energy.He was speaking after a meeting at the Presidential Secretariat.Minister Gamini Lokuge stated that the Ministry of Power has been handed over to Pavithra Wanniarachchi.Gamini Lokuge was the previous Minister of Power.Pavithra Wanniarachchi, the Minister of Transport has been appointed as the new Minister of Power.
